input.sentences: we brought my father 's remains to the crematorium today .
the cemetery was full of tombstones .
it had many large headstones too .
it was behind our local church .
we got my father an angel statue .
output.sentences: We visited the remains of Father John at the crematorium.
We had to walk through the tombstone filled cemetery.
Many of the headstones include a cross, because it is a catholic cemetery.
The local church to the cemetery is quite beautiful.
Outside Father John's burial place is a statue of an angel.
